item.description:
I am amazed our group has never met up for happy hour at Jacob Wirth.

So, wouldn't you say October is a good time to start?

We can raise a few steins and check out the trivia doled out by Morgan J. White, Jr. who is the undisputed Master of the Trivia Universe. After 25 years he continues to amaze folks with his one-of-a kind trivia show at which you yell out categories and he uses his mind-boggling breadth of knowledge to create questions on the fly for prizes.

The game begins at 5:30 PM ends 7:00 PM.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

MBTA:

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route five (5) minute walk from Green Line Copley Square or Green Line Arlington or Orange Line Back Bay
item.name: Oktoberfest Happy Hour
